name: DEATHBASE 900,000,000
description:
DEATHBASE 900,000,000

Collect the solar cells and destroy the evil DEATHBASE, all in the incredible year 900,000,000!

It's amazing, and quite noisy!

FEATURES

  • Graphics and Sounds!
  • Some Levels!
  • Online High Scores!
  • Explosions!
  • Fun Twitch Gameplay!
  • Exclamation Marks!
  • Zero Horses!
  • Silly Robot Voice!

Wooooooo!
